descriptionHTML:
An original JJW watchface now available for Android Wear devices including the Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch R, Moto 360 and more! This watchface brings class, style and sleekness to your wrist!

Note:This watchface supports both square and round screens. The black circle outline displayed in the screenshots will NOT be displayed on your watchface. It is a guide-mark only to provide an indication of how it will look on round screens.

Like Us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces

Be sure to checkout my other watchface creations for Android Wear and the Sony(TM) SmartWatch 2 and if you like this watchface, please consider giving me a good rating as it inspires me to come up with even better designs!

Note: This is an optimised Android Wear Lollipop watch face design and works in active and low power mode to save your watch's battery. By using this watchface you should still continue to get great battery life from your watch unlike other 'pseudo-watchface apps' which chew through your battery.

Installation instructions:

1. Download app via Google Play
2. Click the 'Android Wear' notification in the notifications bar to open the Android Wear configuration app
3. Click 'More' watch faces button
4. Choose the new watchface from the list of watchfaces
5. Enjoy!


Please write a post on my Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/JJWwatchfaces if you need help and I'll do my best to help.


Sony and the Sony logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Sony Corporation.
This app is in no way associated with, endorsed by, or affiliated with, SONY or Sony Mobile.
